dishes.name: Pizza Margherita
dishes.description: Classic Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella and basil.

reviews.comment: Great pizza, but a bit too salty for my taste.

dishes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
dishes.description: Hearty Italian dish with spicy beef sauce and spaghetti.

reviews.comment: Nice and spicy, but a bit too much meat for me.
Delicious! Just the right amount of spice.

dishes.name: Tom-yum Soup
dishes.description: Tom Yum is a sweet and sour soup made from chicken broth with the addition of shrimp.

reviews.comment: You can eat it, but without any taste pleasure.
